name: Dark Theme for Toothl.es
description:
The much requested dark theme on Toothl.es as a user style.

Toothl.es is an IRC chat for all DreamWorks Dragons fans. Movies, shorts, series, anything. Created by IcelandicEel, owner of Berk's Grape- and Forumvine, Toothl.es is the biggest DWA Dragons chat on the internet.

This will be the most up to date version, and might at a later date be integrated into the Toothl.es website.
additional_info:
V1.01:
A quick fix for Chrome to fix the placeholder text in the user list search.

V1:
The initial release. Please give feedback to Iantje in the Toothl.es chat.

Features include:
- Login page redesigned
- Chats redesigned
